title: 92/255/EEC: Commission Decision of 15 April 1992 establishing a list of semen collection centres approved for the export to the Community of deep-frozen semen of domestic animals of the bovine species from certain third countries
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 15 April 1992  establishing a list of semen collection centres approved for the export to the Community of deep-frozen semen of domestic animals of the bovine species from certain third countries  (92/255/EEC)
THE  COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The semen collection centres listed in the Annex are hereby approved for the export to the Community of deep-frozen semen of domestic animals of the bovine species.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 April 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 194, 22. 7. 1988, p. 10. (2) OJ No L 224, 18. 8. 1990, p. 29. (3) OJ No L 8, 11. 1. 1990, p. 71. (4) OJ No L 135, 30. 5. 1991, p. 58.
ANNEX
Poland
